reviews.name: Sony Black DSC-QX10/W Smartphone Attachable Lens-style Camera with 18.9 Megapixels and 10x Optical Zoom
reviews.reviewText: This camera is ease to connect to phone and nothing hard about setting up settings on your phone. The quality is great and pictures come out looking so clear. In low lighting it does not take as great of a picture but it's still a clear picture. I would recommend to anyone.
reviews.title: Great Camera for any Smartphone user

reviews.name: Sony Black DSC-QX10/W Smartphone Attachable Lens-style Camera with 18.9 Megapixels and 10x Optical Zoom
reviews.reviewText:
I really liked the camera.
I reviewed it here:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=50I12J2p5OI&feature=c4-overview&list=UUEgZPWNJpCYoQg8XXOzigTg

Things I did not like:
no control of flash
no viewfinder (duh, but COULD be an improvement)
Takes up your wifi connection (disregard IF using NFC)
reviews.title: Sony QX-10 upgrade to iPhone 4S camera

reviews.name: Sony Black DSC-QX10/W Smartphone Attachable Lens-style Camera with 18.9 Megapixels and 10x Optical Zoom
reviews.reviewText: The idea is fantastic! I love that I can attach a better lens and take unique photos. The disappointment came when I realized that I'm not able to use this lens as a replacement for my camera on my phone. For example, like not being able to use third party apps with the lens. Also, the app is very minimal and doesn't give you much option or control. I was expecting software similar to what I see on the Nex 7 camera I own. The lag time to connect the camera is frustrating as well. I have an iPhone5 and it doesn't just connect - there's a process. I have the QX10 but I'd rather take it back and get the QX100, but only if Sony fixes some of these issues and soon. Great idea, great camera just needs a lot of bugs worked out.
reviews.title: Love the idea...software could be better

reviews.name: Sony Black DSC-QX10/W Smartphone Attachable Lens-style Camera with 18.9 Megapixels and 10x Optical Zoom
reviews.reviewText:
Much better than smart watch (first generation)

-Solid build (full metal)
-Excellent performance (very responded screen, much better processor)
-Battery life is 2 times better than my old watch.

I also have a Pebble watch. But I will never comeback to them.

Regards.
Avetis
reviews.title: Very fast

reviews.name: Sony Black DSC-QX10/W Smartphone Attachable Lens-style Camera with 18.9 Megapixels and 10x Optical Zoom
reviews.reviewText:
All over DSC-QX10 is unique and will be liked by most of us..... But, wht about night shoot....
Will it use Camera flash?????
If ' yes', then no sense using it at night time… the flash would not be that powerful…
reviews.title: 16 October 2013
